questions.question_text: A technician has connected a laptop to a television via HDMI cable. The entire display cannot be seen on the television. Which of the following settings should the technician modify?

A user is searching for a piano keyboard to connect to a PC. The user would like the keyboard to communicate with the PC. Which of the following features should the user look for on a piano keyboard to BEST facilitate this?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
midi est approprié
Musical Instrument Digital Interface (MIDI) cable is used to connect digital instruments together, as well as to computers and recorders.

questions.question_text: Which of the following types of cables are MOST likely to be used to connect to an external hard drive? (Select TWO).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
Les câbles les plus susceptibles d'être utilisés pour se connecter à un disque dur externe sont eSATA et USB 3.0
This question is power but need to be careful

questions.question_text: Which of the following is important when replacing a power supply in a workstation located in a datacenter server rack?

choices.D: The power connector location must be the same
choices.B: The proper voltage must be selected
choices.C: The unit must be the same or less wattage
choices.A: A fanless power supply should be used

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
la tension avant tout !
SMB- Stands for "Server Message Block." it is a network protocol that allows systems within the same network to share files.

questions.question_text: Which of the following protocols would be used for file sharing between MAC OS and Windows OS workstations on a LAN?
